definition: Wong Fei Hung (1847-1924), famous martial artist and revolutionary
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through

eastern bean goose/great/large

sentences.english: This is a subversion of the traditional image of the comedy film Once Upon a Time.
sentences.chinese: 這是一部顛覆黃飛鴻傳統形象的喜劇電影。

sentences.english: The unusually strong story is partially based on the true life of Wong Fei Hung.
sentences.chinese: 由於黃飛鴻的一生世人知之甚少，所以劇情多有虛構。

sentences.english: Huang Feihong is a representative Hongquan master at the end period of Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 黃飛鴻是清末民初具有代表性的洪拳大師。

sentences.english: I like the movie Hunag Feihong best. Do you enjoy swordsman movie?
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡電影《黃飛鴻》，你喜歡武俠片嗎？

sentences.english: I like the movie Huang Feihong most.
